tasks.label: Build ALL then copy updater.exe to SCDToolkit folder
tasks.command: Get-Process -Name 'SCDToolkit','updater' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue ; Remove-Item -Path 'dist' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue ; C:/Python313/python.exe -m PyInstaller updater.spec --noconfirm ; C:/Python313/python.exe -m PyInstaller SCDToolkit.spec --noconfirm ; Copy-Item 'dist\updater.exe' 'dist\SCDToolkit\updater.exe' -Force
